category: Best Motion Picture of the Year

nominations.notes: 12 Years a Slave (2013) became the first film directed and produced by a black filmmaker (Steve McQueen) and also the first to be written by an African-American (John Ridley) to win the Academy Award for Best Motion Picture of the Year.

nominations.notes: Alfonso Cuarón became the first Hispanic and Mexican to win the Academy Award for Best Director.

Best Achievement in Music Written for Motion Pictures, Original Song

nominations.notes: Song: "Alone Yet Not Alone" [NOTE: THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL NOMINATION. After the nominations were announced on January 16, 2014, it was determined that Mr. Broughton had taken actions in promoting the song that were inconsistent with the Academy's campaign regulations. The Board of Governors voted to rescind the nomination on January 29, and only four songs were included on the final ballot.]
